attributes.action: Equal rights for fathers with children.
attributes.additional_details: Fathers should have the same equal rights when it comes to child access and not be treated any diffrently by the courts and CAFCASS. The majority of fathers are accused wrongly by the mother with false allegations that stop the children from seeing their father until a report and investigation is underway. This process takes time and valuable time and money is wrongly wasted to satisfy egos of the women. This in no way benefits ANY child.
